data.title: 2020-21 College Team Academic Award Recipients
data.text:
A total of 658 soccer teams (242 men, 416 women) posted a team grade point average of 3.0 or higher, thereby earning the United Soccer Coaches Team Academic Award for the 2020-21 academic year.

Of that total, 118 schools had both their men’s and women’s programs recognized. Those schools include:

University of Akron University of Alabama-Huntsville Auburn University at Montgomery Aurora University Azusa Pacific University Babson College Bard College Bellarmine University Bethel University (Minn.) Binghamton University Blinn College Boston University Brevard College UCLA California Baptist University California Lutheran University California University of Pennsylvania Carleton College Carroll College Case Western Reserve University Castleton University University of Central Florida Central Connecticut State University Clark University Clarkson University Clayton State University Clemson University Coastal Carolina University Coker University Colby-Sawyer College Connecticut College Creighton University Denison University University of Denver DePaul University University of Detroit Mercy Dominican University (Ill.) Drexel University Eastern Connecticut State University Florida Gulf Coast University Fordham University Franklin & Marshall College Georgia Gwinnett College Georgia State University Goucher College Grove City College Gwynedd Mercy University Hartwick College Hofstra University Holy Family University University of Illinois-Springfield Illinois College Illinois Institute of Technology Illinois Wesleyan University IUPUI Indiana Institute of Technology Kalamazoo College Lawrence Technological University Lees-McRae College Lipscomb University Lock Haven University Maine Maritime Academy Marietta College Marywood University Midway University Misericordia University Mississippi Gulf Coast Community College Missouri State University Missouri University of Science & Technology Monmouth University Nebraska Wesleyan Univesity New Jersey Institute of Technology University of North Alabama University of North Carolina-Greensboro North Carolina State University North Central College University of North Florida Northwestern University Oregon State University Pennsylvania College of Technology University of Pittsburgh Plymouth State University Providence College Robert Morris University Rochester Institute of Technology Rockhurst University Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology Rutgers University St. Bonaventure University St. John Fisher College St. Olaf College College of Saint Rose Sarah Lawrence College University of St. Thomas University of Scranton Siena College University of South Carolina Southern Methodist University Springfield College SUNY Canton Stevenson University Stonehill College Stony Brook University Suffolk University Susquehanna University Thomas University Vasssar College University of Virginia Wartburg College
